Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Education

Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Education to partner with nonprofit organizations to provide on-site pro bono legal assistance at schools to help students and their families with housing issues.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to partner with nonprofit organizations to provide on-site pro bono legal assistance at schools to help students and their families with housing issues.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to provide families of children with disabilities the necessary training and equipment to properly enable distance learning.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to provide families of children with disabilities the necessary training and equipment to properly enable distance learning.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Barron, Ampry-Samuel, Dromm, Louis, Treyger, Cornegy, Levin, Levine, Rodriguez, Rose, Grodenchik, Salamanca, Ulrich and Borelli
